summary: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.
cast: Karan Ashley|Johnny Yong Bosch|Steve Cardenas|Jason David Frank|Amy Jo Johnson|David Yost|Paul Schrier|Jason Narvy|Paul Freeman|Gabrielle Fitzpatrick|Nicholas Bell|Peta-Marie Rixon|Jean Paul Bell|Kerry Casey|Mark Ginther|Julia Cortez|Jamie Croft|Paul Pantano|Mitchell McMahon|Tim Valka|Peter Mochrie|Scott McGregor|Paula Morrell|Paul Goddard|Robert Simper|Robyn Gol|Kerrigan Mahan|Robert L. Manahan|Robert Axelrod|Barbara Goodson|Richard Steven Horvitz|Martin G. Metcalf|Richard Genelle|David Jobling|Neil Kaplan|R.J. Kizer|Fraser Mainwaring|Johnny Torres
